allow:
Bash(git commit -m "$\(cat <<''EOF''
Refactor Account pages with AccountService and code-behind pattern

- Create AccountService with centralized authentication logic:
  - LoginAsync, RegisterAsync, ConfirmEmailAsync, ResetPasswordAsync
  - SetupOwnerAsync, SetPasswordAsync, SendPasswordResetLinkAsync
  - HasUsersAsync for setup flow control
- Add result types in Shared.Model.Account:
  - LoginResult, RegisterResult, ConfirmEmailResult
  - ResetPasswordResult, SetPasswordResult, SetupOwnerResult
- Move parameter classes to Shared.Model.Account namespace
- Separate Account pages into .razor and .razor.cs code-behind files
- Remove unused Identity pages \(2FA, passkeys, manage, external login\)
- Move Identity helpers to WebService/Identity folder
- Add Profile page at /user/profile
- Fix StatusMessage null reference for HttpContext
- Fix logout antiforgery token issue with DisableAntiforgery\(\)

Co-Authored-By: Claude Opus 4.5 <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
\)")

Bash(git commit -m "$\(cat <<''EOF''
Rename WebService project to DevCoreApp.Admin.WebService

Move project into subdirectory src/Server/WebService/DevCoreApp.Admin.WebService/
and update namespace from DevInstance.DevCoreApp.Server.WebService to
DevInstance.DevCoreApp.Server.Admin.WebService throughout the codebase.

Co-Authored-By: Claude Opus 4.6 <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
\)")
